thread.title: Rentrak To Host Investor Day In New York City On October 1 - Yahoo Finance
thread.title_full: Rentrak To Host Investor Day In New York City On October 1 - Yahoo Finance

author: Rentrak
title: Rentrak To Host Investor Day In New York City On October 1 - Yahoo Finance
text:
PORTLAND, Ore., Sept. 17, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Rentrak Corporation ( RENT ), the leader in precisely measuring movies and TV everywhere, today announced it will host an Investor Day on Thursday, October 1 beginning at 12:30 p.m. EDT at Convene Midtown East in New York City. Registration and lunch begin at 11:30 a.m. EDT.
Rentrak participants include:
Bill Livek -- Vice Chairman & Chief Executive Officer David Chemerow -- Chief Operating Officer & Chief Financial Officer Caroline Horner -- Senior Vice President, Product Innovation Steve Walsh -- Executive Vice President, Local Television Chris Wilson -- President, National Television Special guest panelists include representatives from:
Analytics Media Group Civis Analytics Deep Root Analytics IRI MODI Media Oracle Data Cloud Scripps Networks TVB Attendance is by invitation only and space is limited. Professional investors wishing to attend should contact Laurie Berman at 310-279-5962, or by email at lberman@pondel.com .
A live webcast of the presentations will be available through a link on the "Investor Events" page on Rentrak's website at www.rentrak.com . A replay of the presentations will also be available on the Rentrak website for one year.
About Rentrak Corporation
Rentrak ( RENT ) is the entertainment and marketing industries' premier provider of worldwide consumer viewership information, precisely measuring actual viewing behavior of movies and TV everywhere. Using our proprietary intelligence and technology, combined with advanced demographics, only Rentrak is the census currency for VOD and movies. Rentrak provides the stable and robust audience measurement services that movie, television and advertising professionals across the globe have come to rely on to better deliver their business goals and more precisely target advertising across numerous platforms including box office, multiscreen television and home video. For more information on Rentrak, please visit Rentrak.com .
RENTF
